member_organisations:
AMBER Alert Europe has 22 members in 16 countries, 6 of which are law enforcement organizations. Its police expert group exists of over 35 people from 12 countries.  
Its Board and Advisory Board are composed of a selection of independent experts from law enforcement, academia, civil service as well as civil society. 
 
It is the biggest European citizen sourced- initiative with 3 million participants across the European Union.
fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Communication
